items.content_html: This repository contains a complete solution for detecting toxicity across voice and text chats, cost efficiently and at scale, in near real time. It makes use of a number of Serverless and Fully Managaed AWS services, including Amazon SageMaker, Amazon Cognito, AWS Lambda, AWS Amplify, and Amazon Transcribe
items.title: aws-samples/realtime-toxicity-detection: This repository contains a complete solution for detecting toxicity across voice and text chats, cost efficiently and at scale, in near real time.
